content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- JNLP File for Integrated Data Viewer --> <jnlp spec="1.0+" codebase="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/idv/current/webstart/">   <information>     <title>Integrated Data Viewer</title>     <vendor>Unidata</vendor>     <homepage href="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/idv/index.html"/>     <description>Integrated Data Viewer (IDV)</description>     <description kind="short">A tool for geoscientific analysis and visualization.     </description>     <icon href="IDV/idv.gif"/>     <offline-allowed/>   </information>    <resources>     <j2se version="1.6+" max-heap-size="1024m" java-vm-args="-XX:MaxPermSize=128m"/>     <jar href="IDV/idv.jar"/>     <extension name="IDV Base" href="IDV/idvbase.jnlp"/>   </resources>   <resources os="Linux">     <property name="j3d.sharedctx" value="false"/>   </resources>    <application-desc main-class="ucar.unidata.idv.DefaultIdv">     <argument>-data</argument>     <argument>type:opendap.grid:https:/rsg.pml.ac.uk/thredds/dodsC/CCI_ALL-v1.0-DAILY</argument>     <argument>-oneinstanceport</argument>     <argument>14445</argument>   </application-desc>    <application-desc main-class="ucar.unidata.idv.DefaultIdv"/>   <security>     <all-permissions/>   </security>  </jnlp>
